mapper.select: SELECT order_id , shop_id ,(SELECT SHOP.name FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP.id = 1 )AS shop_name,(SELECT dog.item FROM MENU AS dog WHERE dog.id = pay.item_id) AS item, (SELECT cat.NAME FROM CATEGORY AS cat WHERE cat.id = pay.order_id )AS menu, cash, card, duedate FROM PAYMENT AS pay WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} ORDER BY duedate
